post.body: good that I did not see ur tweet then. N I don't need ur help now. Thanks :-P
u dont get that cos that was a stupid tweet :-P. Ignorant me thought gobi is in Rajasthan :-P
chances r high as he hails from the land of cooks, the one which starts with O and ends with A. :-P NOM
External certs are easier than the @Infy certs. Mainly cos 1) U have the dumps 2) Good, nice, informative Qns/ans and not sucky ones
one more tweet and u r an elite member :P. Congo rats!
yep. :P He was okay with that at first. Now he's sent me a mail asking me to do it regularly from now on :|.
i guess thats because@Wneo is following himself
did i read it right? :| disturbing...
external cert? which one? I have a feel that external certs are 100 times easier than @infy ones :|
the sad part is my phone is not connected. It needs wi-fi :|. Dont know if vodafone provides data plans for unlocked iphones :|
and you are right on track buddy, with all the cribbing and stuff :P. What do i crib abou..errr tweet about now? ;-)
:D Lol!! Reminds me of all the 'Adhu varudhu, Odungo' Classics in Tamil :D
Alrighteos. Reviews are suggesting otherwise. But T3, it is. Now i have to book tickets for 2 ;-) if its available that is :P
hey there
cats. Wats so special about cats :-P
whats so special about them? :-P
u talking about Internet conn? iPhone data package? Am confused
u mean a autobiographical movie by KJ? I don't think dostana is that bad :-P
7 hours. That's the longest I've been on fone. 9pm to 4am. I'm bloody sure that I will never be able to break it.
:-P I told u. This is enough for me. My dad is not Einstein, rem? :-P
teradata, oracle, SQL server, informatica, Ab initio, BO, crystal reports. Enough for me :-P. I'm just another wanna be SW engg u c :D
I was in EMEA. Then RETX as I've always worked for retail clients. Then I demanded DW projs n now I'm in SI :-D.
I wanted to continue working in DW n all my DM could do is to help me find one in SI. :-D its not like I forced em. :-)
I am a Newbie at SI. Joined last month as there r no more BI projs in RETL.
no matter what others say r comment, iPhone truely rocks. Esp if u've spent only 13K on that. :-D
My fren @ infy got 1.5C and hes just 25 :|. Hes never been anywhere outside S.India. And he is bald :'( and my mom says dowry is bad
so they are the ones i see in the dorm, eh? ur friends. :P
I am at home :-D. Took d 1:30 bus. Had ayala fry, bullet rice n slept nicely :-P
so Aamir is the winner this time. Yay! I am sure Ghajini is gonna be a huge huge hit. 25th will see both ghajini n curious case of BB
Reading a PG Wodehouse book might help :-D
Happy Bday buddy.
Shit! I hate to go to office just to swipe in :| Gimme werk!
Whatever Sivamani does is music. The guy even farted in the middle jokingly n there was applause all around.
Oh and did I tell you that it was a free pass concert ;-)
Back from times of India concert. Zhakir Hussein, ShankarM'devan, sivamani, mandolin sreenivas n SelvaGanesh at their best. Worth the ticket
Ah! Bonnie n Clyde download is done. This is fast. Now should I or shouldn't I? I think I should :-P
Lucky no slevin. Awesome screenplay. Wonder why its not in imdb top 250. One of the best movies I've watched off the late.
Lucky number slevin #movie.
Typos, I bow to thee!
The word tweet reminds me of a mail I sent to someone who follows me now :-P. D mail had a typo for the word test. :-D
Alright! That takes care of my 'today's crib tweet' :-D what do I tweet about now? :-P
No wonder people call me a cauliflower brain :-/
I hate this cook :-/ I dunno if he works for us or if we work for him. He cooks his fav stuffs daily n they happen to be any gobi stuff :-/
Dreams on fire -SDM. Awesome song. #music
Tracklist of slumdog millionaire says: lyrics n gibberish - AR Rahman :-D (for oh saaya)
Alright! That was my first RT. ARR Rocks!!! :D
RT @milliblog http://tr.im/1pxr - Abhi-Ash to sing for Rahman + chk the last line - this man is humility personified!!
i guess @nb42 is the prolific tweeter of them all.
All of a sudden i'm feeling so guilty.
erm... Doomed! I will have to stay at office for 9:15 minutes daily from now on. Also i'll have to swipe in and swipe out :|. Manager's mail
Booked the slot for the cert. I believe that 42 is the answer to life universe and all the multiple choice questions. It better be correct.
Temple of the king in repeat mode. Assom guitar. Ritchie Blackmore. Good lyrics.
And i only hope and pray that he brings Oscar home for 'Slumdog Millionaire' OST. He deserves it.
Me thinks Behka is the best bollywood song in recent times. Jazz + Pop. ARR is God :D
The word tweet is very disturbing. It always reminds me of something which rhymes with it :|. may be they should rename twitter as switter
Just realized. 50 more tweets and i'll be the last one to join the elite 1000 tweets club. Dad will be proud. Shud prepare the Thank-u-list
Gawd! Ishould be studying now. Certification is IMPORTANT. :|
Death race, Transporter 3! Which one should i watch today?
Had the previlege of working under an awesome manager and SPM, two people whom i will miss. Hope my new manager is as good as they were
Completed 2 Teradata Certs, Learned a lot by working from the local onsite, made a lotta friends there with whom i can lunch with ;-)
Like @ABVan and others i too have this bad/good habit of keeping a To-Do list. Stricking out mosta the things now :D. 2008 is not that bad.
Not a bad weekend for me. Had the regular 2 day weekend and did a lotta things. Mainly cos its Dec and i wanna end the year on a happy note
Arranged my wardrobe. Realised that i've too many shirts :|. Decided not to buy any in 2009. Planning to keep half of em in my parents home
Trying my luck with guitar again. Joined a class next to my house. Hope i practice regularly this time around.
Darn! Just realised that I'm am elite member of '1000 tweets club'. Missed an opportunity to thank people :-P.
The wannabe iPhones omnia n xperia suck, mainly coz of the OS.
Gonna watch Sandesham :D. Got the DVD finally thanks to a friend @ infy. Hyderabad blues and Haasil next in the list.
This win after facing a tough competition from TDK, TCCOBB, QoS and et al makes ARR a true international star . Proud to be a Rahmaniac ;-)
Yay! ARRs score for SDM wins him LA critics award. Awesome. Next is what? Oscar?
Awaiting ghajini. Hope they've reworked the last 30 mins. Those 30 mins in the Tamil version sucked.
Darn! Twinkle doesnt have a RT option. Anyway, ARRs 2nd private album after vande mataram will b out on 12th. RT @milliblog can't wait. Yay!
Roomie is watching tropic thunder. Damn, I just woke up. Planning to watch it at night.
I absolutely adore arrow books. A collectors pride. Looks awesome on book shelves. Glad that they are publishing almost every good now.
Mysore, Hyderabad, Pune, chennai. I'm goin on short term(1 year) transfer. Where, am not very sure.
Okay! So this is like the awesomest DVD gift that i've ever got. :D
Sandesham - If you haven’t seen it, then you’re really missing something. One of the best movies i've ever seen.
the previous tweet was a retweet. its originally @milliblogs :D
"The thing is, if this is true, it's hard to know who should be more embarrassed" - hilarious comment on Joe Satriani suing Coldplay :-)
Twinkle says that my last two tweets were from Pune, Maharashtra. All the other ones from Bangalore, Karnataka. What the eFf?
6 hours of sleep in the last 64 hours. Daymn! I need to get a life. :-/
Roomies are watching pulp fiction. Am listening to the dialogues from my room :-D. Am tempted to get up, go n watch the movie. But am tired.
The kids section is nice. I was tempted to buy a lotta books for my kid cousins. Thankfully I dint carry my credit card with me.
And that leaves me with nothing for Xmas shopping. I'm sure I'm gonna use credit card. Darn!
Bought all the seven spiderman comics collections and 6 of the tin tin books I dint have. Almost a comic books shopping today :-D.
Back from strands book fest. Not very impressive. You get all of those books @ infy strands for d same % discount. 2006 fest is the best.
Curious case of Benjamin button -5, Slumdog millionaire -4, The dark knight -1. No of nominations for golden globe awards. Hope ARR wins
Straight 40 hours without any sleep :-/.
